Testing out the podcast

The Pacific Current
Local Island People doing Island Kine Tings

A podcast featuring interviews with the future and current leaders of Hawaii and how they are shaping the future we will soon call home. A mix of the creative, cultural, and business-minded people of the islands. For the people, by the people.
